phrases: Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Let us see, now I have to...
Hey, Belldandy, we should be leaving soon.
I have got to go to college now.
All right, we are off now.
No way am I going to be defeated by that Keiichi!
I will make sure Big Sister has eyes for no one but me!
A Heart Stolen by a Goddess?
When I am finished building this, I just know it will make Big Sister happy!
You are the most important person in my life after all!
It is not a big deal, being forced to organize all the professor's data...
An all-purpose robot who will protect and serve Big Sister with its devotion...
With this on our side, we have nothing to fear from Marller either!
And that is all she wrote.
Okay, I guess I should hit Save...
Let us go, you got him!
Now releasing the final safety device.
All 15 hours and 22 minutes of my hard work...
Just when Big Z was about to wreak total havoc...
Only one person could have done this... it is that girl!
What in the world were you thinking?
What are you going to do about all that data?
Your timing is perfect, you know.
This is the multi-functional Big Sister Helper Robot, which I invented.
He handles all household chores and has a demon-thwarting function.
He is an all-purpose robot and his name is...
I cannot believe you made another useless piece of junk!
I cannot believe my data was lost because of this...
I missed the part where Big Z goes on a rampage because of you!
How are you going to make up for it?
15 hours and 22 minutes worth of work went down the drain for this?
This robot I built... he really is useful, he is!
Oh, you are such a crybaby.
Who is that, a new friend?
It is nothing but a piece of junk that Skuld created.
You are not a piece of junk, all right?
Pleased to meet you, Mr. Banpei!
I would like to be your friend!
My, are you going to help me?
Little do they know what a terrible plan I have up my sleeve!
I will force that Keiichi to take this maximum strength hair-growth potion...
Wait, should I go with the potion that will make his skin...
Or maybe it is better to use this one?
It feels so good to do the laundry on a sunny day.
When I look at that blue sky and those white clouds...
I do not know why, but...
I will use this potion that will make his feet itch for 30 years!
And we were saved by this little fellow.
He is useful, just like I said!
Please turn it off as soon as possible.
'The Galaxy Vagabond Force' is about to start.
Come on, we just got rid of Marller.
Why do I have to get yelled at?
But I guess it does not matter, since I made Big Sister happy.
Okay, now I am set to re-organize all that data...
Deromasa Hankachou at two is an absolute must-see!
Thank you for guarding the door.
Oh, my, is he powered down?
I feel sorry for him for not being able to move.
Please, stop powering on that thing.
I do not care if it is you, I will not have it!
The next time it happens, I will trash it!
Would you mind activating it while we are at school?
You have a purpose in life, too.
That is why you were brought into this world.
Everything in this world is born out of necessity.
So you have nothing to worry about.
I am going to try to insert a booster circuit.
If it works, he will be able to operate on half the amount of electricity.
And I am sure that Banpei will appreciate how much you care.
Is there anything I can do to help?
Since I am the one who built Banpei, I want you to let me finish the job on my own.
In that case, let me bring you the ice cream I made yesterday!
The lights did not go out, either!
Is the power going to be okay?
Hey, what is the big idea, Keiichi!
Get away from her right now!
Thank goodness... he is got a power cord...
He is not programmed to attack people.
That might be true, but he sure was not trying to be friends just now.
I wonder what happened to him...
I wonder what happened to him...
The data's been rewritten to make him protect Big Sister...
According to the log, he used the booster circuit to rewrite the data himself.
But I am sure there must be some kind of reason.
We might be able to pinpoint the reason if we power him on again.
Keiichi, will he be all right?
Oh, I am sure he will figure it out somehow...
After all, Skuld is the person who created you.
Skuld, Keiichi, and Urd are all important to me.
So please, try to get along with them.
That is MY Big Sister he stole!
Cannot you do something about it?
So you brought us some ice cream?
After monopolizing MY Big Sister all day!
You will have to try harder to fool me!
Maybe he is starting to warm up to us?
Maybe he is starting to warm up to us?
Anyway, he just will not leave Belldandy's side, will he?
That is the one conclusion I never wanted to utter myself...
Ah no, there is no mistake.
Did not you see his eyes?
But I never installed any emotion circuits.
Belldandy has something inside her that no one will ever understand.
It is a power that draws everyone to her, whether human or object.
You pour your soul into making lunch for those who are dear to you.
I hope you will be modified someday so that you can eat, too.
I will spike your lunch with this potion, and a beanstalk will grow from your nostrils!
As if I would fall for the same tactic over and over!
Hey, that is my Big Sister's lunch box!
Do not you dare treat me like a child!
If you are going to go that far, I think I will take you on...
That the best you can do?
It is been three minutes and you still have not answered me.
Maybe you are taking a little nap now, since it is so nice out today?
This is the perfect day to take a nap.
Oh, my, there is some kind of commotion going on outside.
You are not going to get the best of me!
Listen, you, stay out of my way!
You are going to help me out?
Banpei, just do exactly as I say.
As if I would fall for the same trick again!
Oh, that was no big deal.
His memory's going to get erased!
Why did this have to happen?
Skuld did her best to restore Banpei's memory.
Even so, both Skuld and Belldandy seem to believe that...
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
The demon is enraged, and swears to get revenge on the goddesses.
And so the demon-god is resurrected, and spreads misfortune everywhere.
Next episode,'Ah! Misfortune Arrives, and the Tea-Stalk Stands Upright?'
Is that why the Earth Spirit ran, and got captured by the little girl?
